Title: The Enemy
Writer: Djordje Milosavljevic, Dejan Zecevic (collaborating writer), Vladimir Kecmanovic (collaborating writer)
Actors: Aleksandar Stojkovic, Vuk Kostic, Tihomir Stanic, Ljubomir Bandovic
Plot: The story begins a couple days after the war has ended. A group of Serbian soldiers in charge of clearing the fields from mines discovers a man sealed inside a factory's basement. A ...
Country: Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Hungary
